name: Black Rock Shooter: The Game
description:
A young girl discovers that the planet has come under the iron rule of alien invaders...and that she is humanity's last hope for survival. Now, she and the other survivors must track down the aliens and take back their home, or die trying.
Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 384KB
